General.Name: Woosung Feed
General.Description: Woosung Co., Ltd. produces and sells assorted feeds under the Hanwoo Maru and Hwangto Pork brands for livestock and fishing industries in South Korea and internationally. It offers feeds for hogs, cattle, poultry, fishes, and dogs. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Daejeon, South Korea.

1.Name: Gwang-Su  Pyo
1.Title: Director of Sales Division and Deputy Managing Director
